text: Gunavantha is a 2007 Kannada romance film directed by Raghuvardhan and starring Prem Kumar and Rekha Vedavyas in the lead roles with Sharan and Rangayana Raghu in other pivotal roles. The film had musical score and lyrics written by Hamsalekha. The film opened on 30 November 2007 to mixed reviews and didn't perform well at the box-office. ==Cast== * Prem Kumar as Guna shekar * Rekha Vedavyas as Uma * Rangayana Raghu as Gold Reddy * Sharan * Avinash * Chitra Shenoy as Padma * Padmaja Rao * Ramesh Bhat ==Soundtrack== The film's score and soundtrack was composed by Nadha brahma Hamsalekha.Gunavantha songs ==References== ==External links== *Gunavantha reviews Category:Indian films Category:Indian romance films Category:2007 films Category:2000s Kannada-language films Category:Films scored by Hamsalekha Category:2000s romance films
title: Gunavantha
